project_plan.name: Temperature Conversion CLI Tool
project_plan.description: Develop a command-line tool in Python that allows users to convert temperatures between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

task.name: Implement command-line interface to accept user input for temperature and desired output unit
Implement input validation to ensure valid temperature values and units
Write tests for the temperature conversion feature, including edge cases
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure functionality and accuracy
